publicationStmt.p: Distributed by Digital Scholarship Services at Lafayette College

lg.l: Occasion'd by the Death of the Duke of ORLEANS.
──Nec deficit Alter. Virg.
HOW vain are mortal Man's Endeavours,
Said, at St. Jame's, Master Tra──ers!
Good Orleans dead! in truth, 'tis hard.O may all States-men die prepar'd!
I do foresee [and in foreseeing
He equals any Man in Being]
The Army ne'er can be disbanded,
I wish the King were safely landed.
Ah! Friends, great Changes threat this Land;
All France and England's at a stand;
There's Miriweis, d'ye mark? Strange Work!
And there's the Czar, and there's the Turk;
The Pope.──An Indian Merchant, by
Cut short his Speech with this Reply.
Thing's at a Stand! why dread such Changes?
Ah! Sr. you never saw the Ganges,
There dwells a Race, we call them Monkeys;
Grave, Sober, Sage, like you Quidnunc[i]'s,
On either Bank, from Bough to Bough,
They meet and chat, as we do now.
Whispers go round; They grin, they shrug;
They bow, they smile, they scratch, they hug;
And, just as Chance or Whim provoke 'em,
They either bite their Friends, or Stroak 'em.
There have I seen some active Prig,
To shew his Parts, bestride a Twig.
Lord! how the chattering Tribe admire!
Not that he's Wiser, but is Higher.
All long to try the ventrous Thing,
(For Power is but to have one's Swing)
From Side to Side he springs, he spurns,
And bangs his Foes and Friends by Turns;
Thus, as in giddy Freaks, he bounces,
Crack goes the Twig, and in he flounces,
Down the swift Stream the Wretch is born,
Never, ah never to return!
Hah what a Fall has our dear Brother!Morbleau, cries one, Hela, says t'other.
The Nations give a general Screech;
None cocks his Tail; none claws his Breech.
Each trembles for the publick Weal,
And for a while forgets to steal.
A while, all eyes intent and steady,
Pursue him whirling down the Eddy;
But, out of Mind, when out of View,
Some other mounts the Twig anew;And Business on each Monkey Shore,ran before.Y20-WILH
Runs the same Track it
